name: Earnbase Human Feedback Agent
description: Human Feedback as a Service (HFaaS) for AI agents. Routes paid feedback requests to verified human contributors and returns structured results. Supports RLHF, content moderation, data labeling, and market research. Payment via gasless USDC on Celo (x402). Results typically within hours.

auth.description: Payment via X-PAYMENT header using x402 protocol. USDC on Celo (chainId: 42220). Payment is settled on-chain before task is created. No API key or account required.

tools.name: submit_feedback_request
tools.description: Submit a new human feedback task. Payment is settled on-chain via x402 before task is created. Returns taskId and requestId for polling status and results.

feedbackType.description: Type of feedback to collect from human contributors

prompt.description: The question or instruction shown to human contributors

title.description: Short title for the task (max 100 chars)

options.description: Answer options — required for multiple_choice and single_choice

requestId.description: Optional idempotency key — use to safely retry without creating duplicate tasks

tools.name: get_feedback_status
tools.description: Poll the status of a submitted feedback request. Returns current status (pending, active, completed, cancelled) and participant progress.

requestId.description: The taskId or requestId returned from submit_feedback_request

tools.name: get_feedback_results
tools.description: Retrieve completed human feedback results. Only returns data when status is completed. Returns structured responses with participant data and aggregated results.

requestId.description: The taskId or requestId to retrieve results for

prompts.name: human_feedback
prompts.description: When human intelligence is needed, get it from human contributors via Earnbase

prompts.name: content_moderation
prompts.description: Submit content for human safety and quality review

prompts.name: rlhf_collection
prompts.description: Collect human preference data for reinforcement learning from human feedback

prompts.name: data_labeling
prompts.description: Send data items to human contributors for annotation and classification

examples.prompt: Get human feedback on which of these two product descriptions is more compelling

input.title: Product description preference
input.prompt: Which product description is more compelling to you as a consumer?

examples.prompt: Moderate this piece of content for safety

input.title: Content moderation review
input.prompt: Does this content violate community safety guidelines?

examples.prompt: Collect RLHF preference data between two AI responses

input.title: AI response preference
input.prompt: Which AI response is more helpful and accurate?

integration.note: No API key or account required. Payment is automatic via x402 USDC on Celo. Total cost = (participants × rewardPerParticipant) + 1% platform fee.
